fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Visit a player each night and learn how many times they've been visited throughout the game. This processes at the end of each night, after other night abilities. Additionally, anyone who visited them that night will receive no feedback.
- Alter the wind around four players. Transport all of them randomly. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You are astral and have roleblock and prevention immunity.
